articles.title: Pope Francis to spotlight conflicts ‘world has tired of’ on trip to DR Congo, South Sudan - FRANCE 24 English
articles.description: Pope Francis arrived in Kinshasa on Tuesday for a six-day visit to the Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC) and South Sudan, two fragile African nations where protracted conflicts have displaced millions of civilians, sowing death, hunger and despair.
